input.sentences: the photographer made a hidden camera .
she took pictures of the crowd .
she even got pictures of individuals .
she got a picture of a taxi getting a ticket .
output.sentences: She was secretly taking a picture.
Then found what she was looking for, the lady in the pink coat.
The lady was lost in the crowd of people.
Then she saw a lawyer walking out to his car.
When he got to his car, an officer was writing a parking ticket.
